title: REG-HBOS Plc FRN Variable Rate Fix
content:
FRN Variable Rate Fix 
 
 
 Re:  HBOS PLC    EUR 1,000,000,000.00    MATURING: 21-Mar-2017    ISIN: XS0292269544       PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT THE INTEREST RATE FOR THE PERIOD 21-Sep-2015 
          TO 21-Dec-2015  HAS BEEN FIXED AT 0.66 PCT     DAY BASIS: ACTUAL/360     INTEREST PAYABLE VALUE 21-Dec-2015 WILL AMOUNT TO:  EUR 83.8 PER EUR 50,000.00 DENOMINATION  
 
 

 
View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150918005604/en/ 
 
HBOS Plc
